short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open the native dino game in a new tab or standalone window via the toolbar button.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to open the browser's native dino game by clicking on the toolbar button.

This add-on opens the native dino page (about://dino) and has no third-party libraries or plugins. You can open the game in a new tab or a standalone window. Please select the desired context from the toolbar button context-menu items. Moreover, you can open the game by clicking on the - Dino - item in the mouse right-click on any page.

Note: Dino Button add-on does NOT belong or relate to Chrome and has NO affiliations with Google Inc. at all. It is an unofficial extension that is developed and maintained independently by its author.

If you have a feature request in mind or found a bug to report, please fill out the bug report form on the addon's homepage (https://mybrowseraddon.com/dino-button.html).
